scripts.buildall: ng build admin && ng build auth && ng build community && ng build comphub && ng build dashboard && ng build data-insights && ng build data-management && ng build employees && ng build form && ng build job-description-management && ng build jobs && ng build legacy-content && ng build notifications && ng build paymarkets && ng build peer && ng build pf-admin && ng build project && ng build resources && ng build service && ng build structures && ng build total-rewards && ng build user-settings && ng build surveys
scripts.buildallprod: ng build admin --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='admin' && ng build auth --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='auth' && ng build community --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='community' && ng build comphub --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='comphub' && ng build dashboard --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='dashboard' && ng build data-insights --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='data-insights' && ng build data-management --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='data-management' && ng build employees --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='employees' && ng build form --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='form' && ng build job-description-management --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='job-description-management' && ng build jobs --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='jobs' && ng build legacy-content --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='legacy-content' && ng build notifications --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='notifications' && ng build paymarkets --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='paymarkets' && ng build peer --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='peer' && ng build pf-admin --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='pf-admin' && ng build project --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='project' && ng build resources --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='resources' && ng build service --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='service' && ng build structures --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='structures' && ng build total-rewards --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='total-rewards' && ng build user-settings --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='user-settings' && ng build surveys --configuration production && gulp purgecss -a='surveys'
